Text: Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ku Defid kwogugu unyi e-wñ, ku Defid ka ñwu Netan, akache̩, kakini, Go, omi gugu ef unyi ku ma nʼoli sida ko̩, akpati alo Jihofa muda dʼef ukpo ku ma ko ta ofo.
Taku Netan ka ñwu Defid kakini, E̩ che e̩wñ du ki dʼe̩do̩-we̩, todu O̩jo̩ dʼugbo we̩.
Oñ i lewatʼodu o̩jo̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩, o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Netan kakini,
Lo, kʼe̩ ka ñw adu-mi Defid kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, Uwe̩ ako̩ unyi ñwu mi kʼu nagugu ef uwñ n:
todu omi te̩te̩gugu ef unyi akwʼo̩jo̩ kʼomi du Israe̩l te̩gu wa le̩ gbogbo tʼeñini n. U muda kwef unyabo tef unyabo kpai kwʼuña ugugu tʼuña ugugu omune̩.
Ugbo du kʼu tʼalule̩ kpʼabo Israe̩l chaka, u ko̩la du kpʼamakajo̩ Israe̩l kʼomi ñwa ñwu ma ku ma chʼama-dejute̩ abo-mi Israe̩l kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼame̩ ma fʼunyi sida ko̩ ñwu mi n? mama me̩?
Todule̩ abu kʼuwe̩ aka ñwu Defid adu-mi fai de̩ kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini, Omi mʼuwe̩ du kwʼoko ije̩ wa, kwʼetʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini ubi, kʼuwe̩ ki chʼe̩nu-to̩gba abo-mi Israe̩l;
u la te̩te̩dʼugbo we̩ ugbo du kʼe̩ le, u ño̩ fʼame̩-ne̩bi-we̩ chaka ko̩da rinyo̩ bʼuwe̩ o̩gba te̩; u la che kʼe̩ fʼodu ne̩ kʼi dabe̩ne̩ kʼodu ame̩ne̩lile ku ma jo̩ ile̩-i.
U lañʼabʼuña te̩ ñw abo-mi Israe̩l. Naño̩ ko ma gbe̩, kʼama ki gugu uña e-ma, na ñʼachi kwʼo̩mo̩ ge̩ n; amo̩ma bibi ñʼagwʼuma e̩gbo, dab e̩gba ejodudu
kpʼakwʼo̩jo̩ kʼomi ñwa ñw amakajo̩ ku ma nʼo̩da abo-mi Israe̩l ge̩ n, u la afʼame̩nebi-we̩ dolo chaka. Anoji e-le̩, omi aka ñw e̩-i ka ku Jihofa akʼunyi ñw e̩.
Oñ i awatu, e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩-we̩ jo̩ kpa kʼi dukpe̩ kʼe̩ nyʼugbo amata-we̩, kʼomi adʼugbe̩-we̩ kwane̩ gugu ubi-we̩, kʼowñ le̩ adʼef amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ onugo; oñ nafʼojane̩-wñ lonyane̩.
Owñ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki akʼunyi ñwu mi, oñ nafʼede e-wñ lonyane̩ tʼogbegbele̩.
Omi achʼata-wñ, owñ la achʼo̩ma-mi. U la adʼufe̩de̩nyo̩-mi kwo bʼo̩ te̩ alu kʼu mʼu du bʼe̩ne̩ ki je̩ o̩gba-we̩ te̩ n;
u la ahiʼu gugu ef unyi-mi kpʼef ojane̩-mi ogbegbele̩; e̩re̩ ede-wñ la alonyane̩ ogbegbele̩.
Netan ko̩la ñwu Defid teju o̩la-i du kpai teju ane̩ ego-i chaka.
Taku Defid onu mugudu tʼejefu, oñ i kwogugu o̩gba Jihofa, oñ i kakini, Omi chʼe̩ne̩? O, Jihofa O̩jo̩, unyi-mi la chʼe̩wñ? kʼuwe̩ mʼumi du gbogbo wʼemi?
E-le̩ laño̩ chʼe̩wñ ke̩ke̩ eju-we̩, O O̩jo̩; e̩ laño̩ fʼo̩la e̩wñ ejo̩gba ejo̩gba ugbo unyi adu-we̩ ka me̩; ugugu-mi la dabe̩ne̩ kʼugugu e̩ne̩ ojima eju-we̩, O Jihofa O̩jo̩.
Abu Defid neke ño̩ ka ñw e̩ ugbo ojima kʼe̩ du ñw adu-we̩-i? Todu uwe̩ chema adu-we̩-i.
O Jihofa, tod adu-we̩-i, kpai alu kʼe̩do̩-we̩ onugo de̩, oñ e̩ fʼe̩wñ inaina-i du che, kʼamone̩ ki ma e̩wñ inaina-i chaka.
O Jihofa, i nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi dab uwe̩ n, i la nʼO̩jo̩ omune̩ tʼuwe̩ le n, lugbo e̩wñ du kʼa nʼeti-wa gbo̩.

Oñ ugbo abo uche̩ichiʼka de̩ ile̩-i kʼi dababo-we̩ Israe̩l? e-kʼO̩jo̩ nyʼagba ma tane̩ ñw o̩la-wñ ku ma mud amone̩, kʼe̩ fʼodu ne̩ ñw o̩la-we̩ lugbo e̩wñ lile kpʼe̩wñ ubailo kʼe̩ che, owñ chʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi kʼe̩ ne ma dufu bʼamone̩ we̩ kʼe̩ gba ma kwʼIjipti o̩gba te̩.
Todu uwe̩ mʼabo-we̩ Israe̩l ko che abo-we̩ onugo onugo tʼogbegbele̩; oñ uwe̩ Jihofa mud O̩jo̩-ma.
I chʼifai, O Jihofa, e̩ ki je̩ ñw o̩la adu-we̩ kpʼo̩la unyi-wñ kʼe̩ ka le̩ ki dago kpaka ogbegbele̩, kʼe̩ la che alu kʼe̩ ka.
I ki dago kpaka kʼodu-we̩ ki nʼuwohi nyʼo̩gba ogbegbele̩ ku ma ka kakini, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du chʼO̩jo̩ abo Israe̩l, owñ chʼO̩jo̩ ñw abo Israe̩l gbo: unyi Defid, adu-we̩, kʼi lonyane̩ o̩gba-we̩.
Todu uwe̩, O O̩jo̩-mi mudu tejugede ñw adu-we̩ ka kʼuwe̩ akʼunyi ñw u, todule̩ oñ adu-we̩ li uña ki chadua o̩gba-we̩-i.
I la chʼifai, O Jihofa, uwe̩chʼO̩jo̩, e̩ la fʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩-i katane̩ ñw adu-we̩-i.
Fai i ki la nyʼuwe̩ eju kʼe̩ dʼe̩nyo̩ ñw unyi adu-we̩ todu ki dʼo̩gba-we̩ ogbegbele̩: todu uwe̩, O Jihofa, mʼe̩nyo̩ du ñw u me̩, i la anʼe̩nyo̩ le̩ ogbegbele̩.
